FuncDef: This command sets a value in watts for the Power Safety Alert. The Power Safety Alert minor alarm is generated when the system power capacity drops below the Power Safety Level (in watts) + the Power Safety Alert. This is a critical level, which when breached the system starts shutting down IO cards based on card priority.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of Watts for the power safety alert level. Values-0 to 102600. ParamDefault: Default- 0
